H0.text: three act puccini opera first performed in 1900. La Bohème

H1.text: three act puccini opera first performed in 1900. Madama Butterfly

H2.text: three act puccini opera first performed in 1900. Turandot

H3.text: three act puccini opera first performed in 1900. Tosca

A4.text: Tosca, libretto by Luigi Illica and Giuseppe Giacosa (in three acts – premiered at the Teatro Costanzi, 14 January 1900)

A5.text: La bohème, libretto by Luigi Illica and Giuseppe Giacosa (in four acts – premiered at the Teatro Regio, 1 February 1896)
